articles.author: Andrew McMurtry
articles.title: ‘Tragic news’: Cricket legend dead at 55
articles.description: The cricket world has been left in shock and mourning after the death of former England batter Graham Thorpe died at the age of 55, the England and Wales Cricket Board announced.
articles.content:
The cricket world has been left in shock and mourning after the death of former England batter Graham Thorpe died at the age of 55, the England and Wales Cricket Board announced.

articles.title: Graham Thorpe: Former England batter dies aged 55
articles.description: Former England and Surrey batter Graham Thorpe dies aged 55, says the England and Wales Cricket Board.
articles.content:
Former England and Surrey batter Graham Thorpe has died aged 55, the England and Wales Cricket Board has announced.
Thorpe played 100 Tests for England between 1993 and 2005, as well as 82 one-day i… [+975 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
